title: Brand New Lake Side House - Rajagiriya, Kalapaluwawa
details:
Beautiful luxurious modern house facing lake side ( Diyawana Oya) with 4 bedrooms, 5 toilets, lake view family room, living, dinning, fitted pantry, kitchen, servant's room with a toilet, driver's toilet, parking for 4 cars, roller shutter gate, front and back garden, fully tiled brand new house 3550 sq.ft. for Immediate sale, designed by a Chartered Architect and Constructed by Chartered Engineer.

Rs. 50 Million Negotiable

For more information contact
071 968 6655 or 071 2723146
